channel.title: Spec item
channel.description: i want to make a highway man mask so when u wield it u can funpk any ware in game. does any 1 no how to do this.

item.title: Spec item
item.dc:creator: @ytpingas ytpingas
item.description:
@ytpingas wrote:

ok, your server is a 317, because you start off in a place where you mine right?

thats a 317…

and hes basically saying: who ever is wearing it you can fight anyone without loosing items… (the person with the mask on)

and to make it fair, someone should edit the code so when hes in battle he cant take it of before he dies…

[10 seconds after the fight]

does this help your is my server 317 question, and re-state your question?

Read full topic
